9.5/10 Vid, 9.5/10 Audio. Looks great in fullscreen and very clear image. Nice and crisp. Awesome upload. One of the best movie downloads I've ever had fer the most part. Watched in VLC media player. 

The movie--actually a lot more vulgar than I thought it was. I thought it was just some kinda pseudo-manga that nerds liked... which is true... but I didnt expect it to be like this lol. I never read any of the books, but going by the movie, they seem pretty strange. 

I really enjoyed the movie and I will watch it again, even if the main actor is Michael Cera.
